requirements.summary: Create full-page hero section with animated coin logo, headline, tagline, and CTA buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section occupies full viewport height on load
Coin image is displayed prominently and rotates or bobs with a CSS animation
Headline reads 'THE POINTLESS COIN' in large display typography
Two CTA buttons are visible and styled consistently with the theme

file_operations.description: Create hero section component with full-viewport layout, animated coin image (using frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png), headline 'THE POINTLESS COIN', meme-style tagline, and two CTA buttons ('Buy Now' and 'Join Community'). Apply CSS animation for coin rotation/bobbing effect.
Import and render HeroSection component at the top of the main app layout to serve as the landing section.

requirements.summary: Create sticky navigation bar with logo, site name, and section anchor links
acceptanceCriteria: Nav stays fixed at top on scroll
All anchor links scroll smoothly to their respective sections
Logo and name are visible in the nav bar

file_operations.description: Create sticky navigation component with coin logo (using frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png at smaller size), site name 'The Pointless Coin', and anchor links to sections (About, Tokenomics, How to Buy, Roadmap, Community). Apply fixed positioning and smooth scroll behavior.
Import and render Navigation component at the top level, ensuring it overlays other content with proper z-index.

requirements.summary: Create About section with humorous, self-aware meme-coin explanation
acceptanceCriteria: Section has a clear heading 'About' or 'What is The Pointless Coin?'
Copy is written in a humorous, ironic meme-coin voice
Coin image is used as a visual element alongside the text

file_operations.description: Create About section component with heading, humorous self-aware copy emphasizing lack of utility/purpose in meme style, and coin image (using frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png) as a decorative visual element.
Import and render AboutSection component after HeroSection with appropriate section ID for navigation anchor.

requirements.summary: Create Tokenomics section displaying key stats in bold card/grid layout with meme-style labels
acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 tokenomics stats are displayed
Stats are presented in cards or a prominent grid
Labels use the humorous meme-coin tone

file_operations.description: Create Tokenomics section component with grid/card layout displaying at least 4 stats (e.g., total supply, tax, liquidity lock, contract). Use humorous meme-style labels and bold visual treatment.
Import and render TokenomicsSection component after AboutSection with appropriate section ID for navigation anchor.

requirements.summary: Create How to Buy section with numbered steps and icons
acceptanceCriteria: Section contains at least 4 numbered steps
Each step has an icon or visual element
Steps are written in a clear, beginner-friendly but humorous tone

file_operations.description: Create How to Buy section component with at least 4 numbered steps (e.g., Create wallet, Get ETH/SOL, Swap for $POINTLESS, Hold). Include icons or illustrations for each step and write copy in beginner-friendly humorous tone.
Import and render HowToBuySection component after TokenomicsSection with appropriate section ID for navigation anchor.

requirements.summary: Create satirical Roadmap section with humorous timeline milestones
acceptanceCriteria: Timeline or phase layout with at least 4 phases
Milestones are written in a satirical meme tone
Layout is visually distinct from other sections

file_operations.description: Create Roadmap section component with timeline/phase layout displaying at least 4 phases with satirical milestones (e.g., Phase 1: Launch, Phase 2: Go up, Phase 3: We figure it out, Phase 4: Moon?). Use visually distinct layout from other sections.
Import and render RoadmapSection component after HowToBuySection with appropriate section ID for navigation anchor.

requirements.summary: Create Community section with social platform links styled as bold cards
acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 social platform links are displayed
Each link has an icon and label
Section includes a call-to-action headline

file_operations.description: Create Community section component with call-to-action headline and at least 3 social platform cards (Twitter/X, Telegram, Discord) each with icon, label, and link (using placeholder '#' hrefs). Style as large bold cards.
Import and render CommunitySection component after RoadmapSection with appropriate section ID for navigation anchor.

requirements.summary: Create footer with coin name, disclaimer, copyright, and social links
acceptanceCriteria: Footer is present at the bottom of the page
Disclaimer text is included
Copyright and social links are present

file_operations.description: Create footer component with coin name 'The Pointless Coin', disclaimer text ('This is a meme coin with no intrinsic value or financial utility'), copyright notice, and social links (using placeholder '#' hrefs).
Import and render Footer component at the bottom of the main app layout.

requirements.summary: Apply bold meme-coin visual theme with black background, gold accents, chunky fonts, glows, and animations
acceptanceCriteria: Background is deep black or very dark
Primary accent color is gold or vibrant yellow
Display headings use a bold, impactful font
At least one element has a glow or neon effect
Coin image has a spin or float animation in the hero

file_operations.description: Apply global theme styling: deep black background, gold/vibrant yellow accent color scheme, bold display font imports and configuration, and define reusable glow/neon effect classes. Ensure body and root elements use the dark background.
Extend Tailwind config with custom colors (gold/yellow accent, deep black background), custom font families for bold display typography, and custom animation keyframes for coin spin/float effects.
Apply coin spin/float animation to the coin image element using CSS animation classes. Apply glow effects to CTA buttons and headline as appropriate.

requirements.summary: Use generated coin image throughout the site in hero, nav, and other sections
acceptanceCriteria: Coin image is displayed in the hero section
A smaller version is used as the nav logo
Image is loaded from frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png

file_operations.description: Ensure the coin image src points to frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png and is displayed prominently with animation in the hero section.
Ensure the nav logo uses frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png at smaller dimensions (e.g., 40x40 or 48x48) for the nav bar branding.
Ensure the coin image is included as a visual element using frontend/public/assets/generated/pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png alongside the About copy.
